data.message: all you people can hate ... ill always be em's fan , no matter of his opinons...we all are intitled to our own opinons...he just aint scared to say it ... half of these people say that em lost them... his true fans will stand by his side...❤

replies.message: No they won't I've been huge fan for long time bought all his shit.I didn't steal i bought let that sink in. Now I'm gone with most the people that used to buy his music.
O and there's a million of just like me that dress like but just ain't me.
Exactly James Davis.  You can't tell your fans too fuck off and expect to keep em. I don't care about his opinion on Trump as much as I do that.
But he doesn't want fans that support trump so he pretty much did what you wont...abandon you for your opinion. Good luck.
James but millions around the world will still buy his music
Him bashing Trump is not the issue.  The fact he said fuck you to his fanbase is though
Entitled
Vince O'Connor he said it to those who support Trump

Ni Ta, he said that to people who are “on the fence” about Trump.  So pretty much you either hate Trump’s guts and if you don’t hate him but disagree with Trump sometimes then Eminem tells you Fuck You.  Stop trying to defend this fraud

I used to listen to all his stuff and even support his artists... he lost me. This is why people stay out of politics.  You have every right to your opinion everyone has a right to put their opinion into action by voting... Now he has made his opinion public and told anyone who doesn’t agree FU... so now I don’t agree with his politics and I will do as he asked... I will take my money and support and say FU Eminem and not spend a dime on his or his artists music... and that is my right... Bye Bye Eminem
Simone Åsberg you still buy music lol?
Ok well at least you practically admitted you’re defeated
Bye james
Peace Vince
Has been...trying to get back in the spotlight...here's this...most real Em fans have outgrown his ass anyhow. Give the fuck up and retire already grandpa
Its cute when girls get all "Eminem is my idol". Lol That is sad. I idolize other strong women.  Not a women hating, violent pos.
He is the same as trump when it comes to how he respects women. Or lack of respect I should say. The hypocrisy.  Lol It is literally everywhere. Both sides exhibit it.
How they gonna stand by his side when he don't want them to?  He told them to fuck off!
he doesn’t hate women, try again
Cindy Joyce Douglas U still here? Be gone!!!! Bye!!!
Fuck him

Ni ta I dont have to try again. You said yourself you will defend your idol forever or something like that.  Defend away. I know im not wrong and definitely dont need your validation. Lol especially from someone who.idolizes someone like this. He is trash. But talented trash.
Ok. Thot
As a young woman you of all people should be spurning this piece of shit.
